description: These basic looking socks are anything but. The wool blend keeps them itch-free and lets your feet breathe. Seamless construction provides a smooth fit and ensures no slipping, no bunching and no blisters.Made of fine-gauge merino wool, nylon and spandex to keep your feet cool in the summer, warm in winter.Merino is naturally antimicrobial and prevents your feet from getting funky.True Seamless™ construction fuses seams for chafe-free wear.Darn Tough sources its wool from non-mulesed sheep.
name: Darn Tough Solid Basic Crew Light Socks - Women's
